Texts.Eng: +7% Fire, Electric, Ice, and Poison Resistance

As long as you have enough Energy, drain 1 Energy/Pixel to transmute half of all Pixels you gain into Experience. Pixels are converted with 50% efficiency, for a rate of 1 XP per 2 Pixels. This ability will not affect Pixels you already have, but will affect pixels gained from selling items.
Doing Elemental Damage provides +50% Resistance to that element for 10 seconds.
The Alchemist Station allows you craft throwable potions!
